A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Without getting into too many spoilers\, I did not enjoy 75% of this movie's content. I'm a big Star Wars fan\, and there are some neat ideas in The Last Jedi on top of being a gorgeous film\, but there are a number of things you typically see in very bad movies that I feel people are overlooking because it's Star Wars. From endless ex-machina moments to plots and subplots that go nowhere\, I've never found myself cringing as much or being as bored with a Star Wars film since the prequels.
